<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Vice President-Chief Human Resources Officer since July 2014. From October 2011 to July 2014 he was Vice President, Human Resources for the Forged Products segment of Precision Castparts Corporation (formerly NYSE: PCP). The $4.3 billion segment, with greater than 5,000 employees, is a world-leading producer of complex forgings and high-performance nickel-based alloys and super alloys for aerospace, power generation, and general industrial applications. Prior to that he served with Danaher Corporation (NYSE: DHR), most recently as the Vice President, Human Resources for its Fluke Corporation subsidiary, a leader in the manufacture, distribution, and service of electronic test tools and software worldwide.

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 55 ROMAN,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ITEM 5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 55 ROMAN,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	MARKET FOR REGISTRANT'S COMMON EQUITY, RELATED STOCKHOLDER MATTERS AND ISSUER PURCHASES OF EQUITY SECURITIES
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Applied's common stock, without par value, is listed for trading on the New York Stock Exchange with the ticker symbol &#8220;AIT.&#8221; Information concerning the quarterly stock dividends for the fiscal years ended June&#160;30, 2016, 2015, and 2014 and the number of shareholders of record as of August 5, 2016 are set forth in Item 8, &#8220;Financial Statements and Supplementary Data,&#8221; in the &#8220;Quarterly Operating Results&#8221; table. That information is incorporated here by reference.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	A goodwill impairment charge in fiscal 2016 reduced operating income by $64.8 million, net income by $63.8 million, and diluted earnings per share by $1.62. Excluding the goodwill impairment charge, the fiscal 2016 return on assets would be 6.7%.
</FONT>
</DIV>

<EFX_MANAGEMENTS_DISCUSSION>
<A NAME="FIS_MANAGEMENTS_DISCUSSION"></A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:9PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:54PX;TEXT-INDENT:-54PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 55 ROMAN,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ITEM 7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 55 ROMAN,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	MANAGEMENT'S DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS OF FINANCIAL CONDITION
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 55 ROMAN,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 55 ROMAN,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;&#32;
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 55 ROMAN,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	AND RESULTS OF OPERATIONS.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 55 ROMAN,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	OVERVIEW
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	With more than 5,500 employees across North America, Australia and New Zealand, Applied Industrial Technologies (&#8220;Applied,&#8221; the &#8220;Company,&#8221; &#8220;We,&#8221; &#8220;Us&#8221; or &#8220;Our&#8221;) is a leading industrial distributor serving MRO (Maintenance, Repair &amp; Operations) and OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) customers in virtually every industry. In addition, Applied provides engineering, design and systems integration for industrial and fluid power applications, as well as customized mechanical, fabricated rubber and fluid power shop services. We have a long tradition of growth dating back to 1923, the year our business was founded in Cleveland, Ohio. At June&#160;30, 2016, business was conducted in the United States, Puerto Rico, Canada, Mexico, Australia and New Zealand from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	559
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;facilities.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The following is Management's Discussion and Analysis of significant factors that have affected our financial condition, results of operations and cash flows during the periods included in the accompanying consolidated balance sheets, statements of consolidated income, consolidated comprehensive income and consolidated cash flows in Item 8 under the caption "Financial Statements and Supplementary Data." When reviewing the discussion and analysis set forth below, please note that the majority of SKUs (Stock Keeping Units) we sell in any given year were not sold in the comparable period of the prior year, resulting in the inability to quantify certain commonly used comparative metrics analyzing sales, such as changes in product mix and volume.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Our fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;consolidated sales were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$2.52 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$232.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8.4%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;compared to the prior year, with acquisitions contributing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$57.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.1%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and unfavorable foreign currency translation of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$60.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;decreasing sales by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.2%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Gross profit margin remained stable at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	28.1%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;for fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	28.0%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;for fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Operating margin
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, down from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.7%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;due to a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	non-cash goodwill impairment charge recorded during the third quarter of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, totaling
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$64.8 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, related to the goodwill associated with the Company's Canada and Australia/New Zealand reporting units within the Service Center Based Distribution segment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, the Company recorded charges of $8.8 million for restructuring activities within the Service Center Based Distribution segment to reduce headcount and consolidate locations. Of the total, $3.6 million related to inventory reserves for excess and obsolete inventory recorded within cost of sales, and $5.2 million related to severance and facility consolidation recorded within selling, distribution and administrative expense.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Our earnings per share was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$0.75
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;versus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$2.80
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	73.2%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The current year results include negative impacts on earnings per share of $1.62 per share for the non-cash goodwill impairment charge and $0.16 per share for restructuring charges.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Shareholders&#8217; equity was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$657.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	June&#160;30, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, down from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$741.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	June&#160;30, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Working capital
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$28.7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	June&#160;30, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$507.2 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	June&#160;30, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The current ratio was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;to 1 at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	June&#160;30, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;to 1 at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	June&#160;30, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Applied monitors several economic indices that have been key indicators for industrial economic activity in the United States. These include the Industrial Production (IP) and Manufacturing Capacity Utilization (MCU) indices published by the Federal Reserve Board and the Purchasing Managers Index (PMI) published by the Institute for Supply Management (ISM). Historically, our performance correlates well with the MCU, which measures productivity and calculates a ratio of actual manufacturing output versus potential full capacity output. When manufacturing plants are running at a high rate of capacity, they tend to wear out machinery and require replacement parts.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	15
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage19"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<A STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;" HREF="#AIT-2016630X10K_HTM_S673B78E593AF86E9FF8184D3AB0C0324">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The MCU (total industry) and IP indices have generally trended lower during fiscal 2016 correlating with the overall downturn in the industrial economy, although they increased in the June 2016 quarter. The ISM PMI registered 53.2 in June 2016, the highest reading in fiscal 2016, and an increase from the June 2015 revised reading of 53.1. A reading above 50 generally indicates expansion. The index readings for the months during the current quarter, along with the revised indices for previous quarter ends, were as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	As a % of Net Sales

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sales in fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$2.52 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, which was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$232.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8.4%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	below
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;the prior year, with unfavorable foreign currency translation accounting for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$60.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.2%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of the decrease, offset by sales from acquisitions of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$57.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.1%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Excluding the impact of businesses acquired and prior to the impact of foreign currency translation, sales were down $229.1 million or 8.3% during the year. Of the 8.3% decrease, 5.1% pertains to our upstream oil and gas-focused operations (which experienced sales declines of 50.1% during the year) and 3.2% is within our traditional core operations. There were 253.5 selling days in fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and 252.5 selling days in fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sales of our Service Center Based Distribution segment, which operates primarily in MRO markets,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$167.7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7.4%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Acquisitions within this segment increased sales by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$38.7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.7%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, while unfavorable foreign currency translation decreased sales by $50.7 million or 2.2%. Excluding the impact of businesses acquired and unfavorable currency translation impact, sales decreased $155.7 million or 6.9%, the majority of which relates to the upstream oil and gas-focused operations, as the traditional core operations had a decrease of only 1.7%.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	, while unfavorable foreign currency translation decreased sales by $9.4 million or 1.9%. Excluding the impact of businesses acquired and unfavorable currency translation impact, sales decreased $73.4 million or 14.8%.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	. Acquisitions added

	$0.2 million

	, or less than 1.0%. Prior to the impact of foreign currency translation and excluding businesses acquired, Canadian sales were down $67.4 million or 18.7%, of which 15.4% related to upstream oil and gas operations with the remaining 3.3% decrease from the traditional core operations. Consolidated sales from our other country operations, which include Mexico, Australia and New

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Zealand, decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$10.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.8%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;compared to the prior year. Unfavorable foreign currency translation decreased other country sales by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$26.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	17.1%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Prior to the impact of currency translation, other country sales were up $16.0 million or 10.3% compared to the prior year, driven by growth in operations in Mexico.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The sales product mix for fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	72.9%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;industrial products and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	27.1%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;fluid power products compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	73.2%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;industrial and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	26.8%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;fluid power in the prior year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Our gross profit margin remained stable at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	28.1%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	28.0%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The increase is due to the impact of LIFO layer liquidations recorded in fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;which increased gross profit by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$2.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Selling, distribution and administrative expenses (SD&amp;A) consist of associate compensation, benefits and other expenses associated with selling, purchasing, warehousing, supply chain management, and providing marketing and distribution of the Company&#8217;s products, as well as costs associated with a variety of administrative functions such as human resources, information technology, treasury, accounting, legal, facility related expenses and expenses incurred with acquiring businesses. SD&amp;A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$31.4 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.4%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;during fiscal 2016 compared to the prior year, and as a percent of sales
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	22.0%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	21.3%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Changes in foreign currency exchange rates had the effect of decreasing SD&amp;A by $14.9 million or 2.5% compared to the prior year. Additional SD&amp;A from businesses acquired in the current year added $16.0 million or 2.7% of SD&amp;A expenses including $2.1 million associated with intangibles amortization. Further, severance expense and other restructuring charges related to consolidating facilities added $5.2 million or 0.9% of SD&amp;A for the twelve months ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	June&#160;30, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Excluding the impact of businesses acquired, restructuring expenses, and the favorable currency translation impact, SD&amp;A declined $37.7 million or 6.5% during fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;compared to fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;as a result of continuous efforts to minimize such expenses. These efforts to minimize expense were led by efforts to control headcount. Excluding the effect of acquisitions, overall headcount is down by over 400 associates from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	June&#160;30, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	June&#160;30, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Total salaries and wages were down $17.0 million for fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;compared to fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;while all other expenses within SD&amp;A were down $14.4 million.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During the third quarter of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, the Company performed its annual goodwill impairment test. As a result of this test, the Company determined that all of the goodwill associated with the Australia/New Zealand Service Center Based Distribution reporting unit was impaired as of January 1, 2016. This impairment is the result of the decline in the mining and extraction industries in Australia and the resulting reduced customer spending due to a decline in demand throughout Asia. Further, due to a sustained decline in oil prices and reduced customer spending in Canada, the Company determined that a portion of the goodwill associated with the Canada Service Center Based Distribution reporting unit was also impaired as of January 1, 2016. Accordingly, the Company recognized a combined non-cash impairment charge of $64.8 million for goodwill during fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, which decreased net income by $63.8 million and earnings per share by $1.62. Changes in future results, assumptions, and estimates used in calculating the goodwill impairment test could result in additional impairment charges in future periods.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Operating income
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$95.8 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	51.9%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$88.8 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;during fiscal 2016 from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$184.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;during fiscal 2015, and as a percent of sales,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, primarily due to the non-cash goodwill impairment charge of $64.8 million. Excluding the goodwill impairment charge, operating income as a percent of sales was 6.1%, down from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.7%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in the prior year primarily due to the $8.8 million of restructuring charges incurred during fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and lower sales volume.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Operating income, before the goodwill impairment charge, as a percentage of sales for the Service Center Based Distribution segment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.2%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.2%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. This decrease is primarily attributable to the impact of lower sales and the $8.8 million of restructuring charges recorded to costs of sales and SD&amp;A during fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Operating income as a percentage of sales for the Fluid Power Businesses segment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	9.4%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	9.8%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. This decrease is primarily attributable to a decline in sales without a commensurate decline in the business segment's SD&amp;A expenses.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Segment operating income is impacted by changes in the amounts and levels of expenses allocated to the segments. The expense allocations include corporate charges for working capital, logistics support and other items and impact segment gross profit and operating expense.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Other expense (income), net, represents certain non-operating items of income and expense. This was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$1.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	expense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$0.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	expense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in fiscal 2015. Current year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	expense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;primarily consists of foreign currency transaction losses of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$1.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;offset by unrealized gains on investments held by non-qualified deferred
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	compensation trusts of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$0.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;expense consisted primarily of foreign currency transaction losses of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$1.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;offset by unrealized gains on investments held by non-qualified deferred compensation trusts of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$0.4 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.

<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<A STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;" HREF="#AIT-2016630X10K_HTM_S673B78E593AF86E9FF8184D3AB0C0324">

<DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The effective income tax rate was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	62.6%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;for fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	34.3%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;for fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The increase in the effective tax rate is due to the recording of $64.8 million of goodwill impairment during the current period, of which $61.3 million is not tax deductible. The goodwill impairment increased the effective tax rate for fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	27.1%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The remaining increase in the effective tax rate, adjusted for goodwill impairment, was due to state and local taxes and mix of income negatively impacting the rate. All undistributed earnings of our foreign subsidiaries are considered to be permanently reinvested at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	June&#160;30, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We expect our income tax rate for fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2017
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;to be in the range of 34.0% to 35.0%.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As a result of the factors addressed above, net income for fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$85.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	74.4%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;from the prior year. Net income per share was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$0.75
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;per share for fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$2.80
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;for fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	73.2%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The current year results include negative impacts on earnings per share of $1.62 per share for goodwill impairment charges and $0.16 per share for restructuring charges. Net income per share was favorably impacted by lower weighted average common shares outstanding in fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;as a result of our share repurchase program.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	At June&#160;30,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, we had a total of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	559
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;operating facilities in the United States, Puerto Rico, Canada, Mexico, Australia and New Zealand, versus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	565
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;at June&#160;30,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The number of Company employees was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5,569
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	&#32;at June&#160;30,

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sales in fiscal 2015 were $2.75 billion, which was $291.7 million or 11.9% above fiscal 2014, with acquisitions accounting for $280.2 million or 11.4%. Unfavorable foreign currency translation decreased sales by $43.3 million or 1.8%. Excluding the impact of businesses acquired and prior to the impact of currency translation, sales were up $54.8 million or 2.3% during fiscal year 2015. We had 252.5 selling days in both fiscal 2015 and fiscal 2014.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sales of our Service Center Based Distribution segment, which operates primarily in MRO markets, increased $281.4 million, or 14.3%. Acquisitions within this segment increased sales by $280.2 million or 14.2%. Unfavorable foreign currency translation decreased sales by $36.5 million or 1.8%. Excluding the impact of businesses acquired and unfavorable currency translation impact, sales increased $37.7 million or 1.9%.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sales of our Fluid Power Businesses segment, which operates primarily in OEM markets, increased $10.3 million or 2.1%, primarily attributed to strong sales growth at several of our U.S. based Fluid Power businesses which added $17.1 million or 3.5%, while unfavorable foreign currency translation decreased sales by $6.8 million or 1.4%.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sales in our U.S. operations were up $207.1 million or 10.2%, with acquisitions adding $175.8 million or 8.7%. Sales from our Canadian operations increased $67.5 million or 23.2%, with acquisitions adding $86.4 million or 29.7%. Unfavorable foreign currency translation decreased Canadian sales by $30.4 million or 10.4%. Excluding the impact of businesses acquired and prior to the impact of currency translation, sales were up $11.5 million or 3.9% during fiscal year 2015. Consolidated sales from our other country operations, which include Mexico, Australia and New Zealand, were $17.1 million or 12.4% above fiscal year 2014, with acquisitions adding sales of $18.0 million or 13.1%. Unfavorable foreign currency translation decreased other country sales by $12.9 million or 9.4%. Excluding the impact of businesses acquired and prior to the impact of currency translation, sales were up $12.0 million or 8.7% during fiscal 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The sales product mix for fiscal 2015 was 73.2% industrial products and 26.8% fluid power products compared to 70.7% industrial and 29.3% fluid power in fiscal year 2014. These changes in product mix related entirely to the product mix of recent acquisitions being primarily industrial products.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	18
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage22"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<A STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;" HREF="#AIT-2016630X10K_HTM_S673B78E593AF86E9FF8184D3AB0C0324">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Our gross profit margin was 28.0% in fiscal 2015 versus 27.9% in fiscal 2014. The increased margins were attributable to the impact of relatively higher gross margins from acquired operations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Selling, distribution and administrative expenses (SD&amp;A) consist of associate compensation, benefits and other expenses associated with selling, purchasing, warehousing, supply chain management, and providing marketing and distribution of the Company&#8217;s products, as well as costs associated with a variety of administrative functions such as human resources, information technology, treasury, accounting, legal, facility related expenses and expenses incurred with acquiring businesses. SD&amp;A increased $62.6 million or 12.0% during fiscal 2015 compared to fiscal 2014, and as a percent of sales increased to 21.3% in fiscal 2015 from 21.2% in fiscal 2014. The acquired businesses added an incremental $69.4 million of SD&amp;A expenses, which included an additional $13.4 million associated with acquired identifiable intangibles amortization. Excluding the $11.0 million decline in SD&amp;A from foreign currency translation, the remaining SD&amp;A amounts were similar to fiscal 2014. The increase in SD&amp;A as a percentage of sales was driven by additional intangible asset amortization from businesses acquired.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Operating income increased $20.3 million, or 12.3%, to $184.6 million during fiscal 2015 from $164.4 million during fiscal 2014, and as a percent of sales, remained stable at 6.7%. The increase in operating income dollars was primarily attributable to our acquired businesses.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Operating income as a percentage of sales for the Service Center Based Distribution segment increased to 6.2% in fiscal 2015 from 6.0% in fiscal 2014. This increase was primarily attributable to an increase in gross profit as a percentage of sales, as a result of acquisitions in fiscal 2015 which operated at higher gross profit margins, representing an increase of 0.1%, along with a decrease in SD&amp;A as a percentage of sales of 0.1%.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Operating income as a percentage of sales for the Fluid Power Businesses segment increased to 9.8% in fiscal 2015 from 9.2% in fiscal 2014. This increase was primarily attributable to the leveraging of organic sales growth in our U.S. based Fluid Power Businesses, without a commensurate increase in SD&amp;A expenses.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Segment operating income was impacted by changes in the amounts and levels of expenses allocated to the segments. The expense allocations included corporate charges for working capital, logistics support and other items and impact segment gross profit and operating expense.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Interest expense, net, increased to $7.9 million in fiscal 2015 entirely due to acquisition related borrowing.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Other expense (income), net, represented certain non-operating items of income and expense. This was $0.9 million of expense in fiscal 2015 compared to $2.2 million of income in fiscal 2014. Fiscal 2015 expense primarily consisted of foreign currency transaction losses of $1.3 million offset by unrealized gains on investments held by non-qualified deferred compensation trusts of $0.4 million. Fiscal 2014 consisted primarily of unrealized gains on investments held by non-qualified deferred compensation trusts of $1.7 million as well as $1.3 million of income associated with the elimination of the one-month Canadian and Mexican reporting lags (see note 1 in Item 8 under the caption "Financial Statements and Supplementary Data"), offset by foreign currency transaction losses of $0.8 million.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Income tax expense as a percent of income before taxes was 34.3% for fiscal 2015 and 32.1% for fiscal 2014. This increase in the effective rate was due to recording of valuation allowances against certain deferred tax assets for foreign jurisdictions in fiscal 2015 as well as the non-recurrence of a one-time favorable tax benefit in fiscal 2014 in accounting for undistributed earnings of non-U.S. subsidiaries. All undistributed earnings of our foreign subsidiaries were considered to be permanently reinvested at June&#160;30, 2015 and 2014.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As a result of the factors addressed above, net income for fiscal 2015 increased $2.7 million or 2.4% from the prior year. Net income per share increased at a slightly higher rate of 4.9% due to lower weighted-average shares outstanding in fiscal 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	At June&#160;30, 2015, we had a total of 565 operating facilities in the United States, Puerto Rico, Canada, Mexico, Australia and New Zealand, versus 538 at June&#160;30, 2014.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The number of Company employees was 5,839 at June&#160;30, 2015 and 5,472 at June&#160;30, 2014.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<EFX_LIQUIDITY_CAPITAL>
<A NAME="FIS_LIQUIDITY_CAPITAL"></A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 55 ROMAN,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	LIQUIDITY AND CAPITAL RESOURCES
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Our primary source of capital is cash flow from operations, supplemented as necessary by bank borrowings or other sources of debt. At
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	June&#160;30, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;we had total debt obligations outstanding of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$328.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$321.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	June&#160;30, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Management expects that our existing cash, cash equivalents, funds available under the revolving credit and uncommitted shelf facilities, cash provided from operations, and the use of operating leases will be sufficient to finance normal working capital needs in each of the countries we operate in, payment of dividends, acquisitions, investments in properties, facilities and equipment, and the purchase of additional Company common
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>

</FONT>

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 55 ROMAN,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#76787A;">
	Net Cash Flows
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The following table is included to aid in review of Applied&#8217;s statements of consolidated cash flows; all amounts
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_10"></A>
<BR>
	are in thousands.
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The increase in cash provided by operating activities during fiscal 2016 is due primarily to decreased working capital needs due to lower receivables levels resulting from lower sales levels as compared to the prior period, partially offset by lower operating results.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Net cash used in investing activities in fiscal 2016 included
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$13.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;for capital expenditures and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$62.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;used for acquisitions. Net cash used in investing activities in fiscal 2015 included $14.9 million for capital expenditures and $160.6 million used for acquisitions. Net cash used in investing activities in fiscal 2014 included $20.2 million for capital expenditures, $10.0 million of which was used for the purchase of our headquarters facility, and $184.3 million for acquisitions.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	&#32;of long-term debt repayments and

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$19.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of net repayments under the revolving credit facility, offset by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$125.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of cash from borrowings under the new credit facility. Further uses of cash were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$43.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;for dividend payments,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$37.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;used to repurchase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	951,100
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;shares of treasury stock, and

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Net cash provided by financing activities in fiscal 2015 included $170.0 million from borrowings under long-term debt facilities used for the financing of acquisitions, offset by $17.0 million of net repayments under our revolving credit facility and $2.7 million of long-term debt repayments. Further uses of cash were $42.7 million for dividend payments, $76.5 million used to repurchase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

	&#32;shares of treasury stock and $7.7 million of acquisition holdback payments.
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:18PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:FRUTIGER LT 45 LIGHT,SANS-SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Net cash provided by financing activities in fiscal 2014 included $100.0 million from borrowings under long-term debt facilities as well as $69.0 million in net borrowings under our revolving credit facility, both of which were utilized for the financing of acquisitions. These sources of cash were offset by $40.4 million for dividend payments and $36.7 million used to repurchase

	Table of Contents
